listeners: Message listeners that can be toggled on and off.

listeners.name: starboard
listeners.description: Looks for messages with a certain emoji and sends them to a specified channel.

commands: Commands that can be toggled on and off.

commands.name: dailycat
commands.description: Gives you a random cat picture every day.

moderation.name: superuser
moderation.description: Users with this role can use all moderation commands.
